newsitem.title: HONG KONG: GITIC Hong Kong sets US$50 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: GITIC Hong Kong sets US$50 mln loan.

text.p: Guangdong International Trust and Investment Corp Hong Kong's US$50 million loan facility has been launched into general syndication, bankers said on Friday.
The deal is secured by a letter of comfort from Guangdong International Trust and Investment Corp.
The facility has a three-year tenor and pays a margin of 100 basis points over the six-month London Interbank Offered Rate.
With fees, the all-in return for top-tier managers is 140 basis points.
Proceeds are to be used for general working capital.
Peregrine Fixed Income is the sole arranger.
